checkDetails.leadParagraph: Check the following information is correct before creating this {{noteType}}.
checkDetails.insetText: Any information not shown here will be automatically populated when the {{noteType}} is issued.
checkDetails.recipient: Packaging waste producer or compliance scheme

errors.recipientRequired: Select who this will be issued to
errors.tonnageWholeNumber: Enter {{noteType}} tonnage as a whole number
errors.tonnageGreaterThanZero: Enter {{noteType}} tonnage as a whole number greater than zero

create.helpSummary: Can't find the producer or compliance scheme?
create.recipientHint: Start typing the name of the packaging waste producer or compliance scheme
create.tonnageHint: Enter a whole number without decimal places
create.recipientLabel: Enter who this {{noteType}} will be issued to

help.intro: {{noteTypePlural}} can only be issued to packaging waste producers and compliance schemes who have registered with regulators.
help.listIntro: If the buyer you're looking for is not appearing, check that:
help.listItemOne: you have spelled the name correctly
help.listItemTwo: they are registered with a regulator

create.notesHint: These notes will appear on the {{noteType}}

table.recipientHeading: Packaging waste producer or compliance scheme

list.balanceHint: This is the balance available for creating new {{noteTypePlural}}
